subject: Re: [junit] Performance of the  ant task
msgSnippet: On Fri, 22 Feb 2002,  wrote: [Context:  uses a new VM for each testcase instead of a single VM in forked mode] ... I wouldn t be
messageBody:
On Fri, 22 Feb 2002, <magnus@...> wrote:

[Context: <junit> uses a new VM for each testcase instead of a single
VM in forked mode]

>> Stephane Bailliez is currently working on a reimplementation of
>> that task and I think his implementation will always be forked and
>> be equivalent to the "once" case above.
>
> That would be a total lifesaver. Any timeframe on that?

I wouldn't be suprised if Stephane was subscribed here and could
respond himself.

> ps. I'm sorry for mixing up my ant tasks,

No problem at all.

Stefan
